alert.note: Alert for Lemhi (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Air Quality Alert issued September 15 at 8:02AM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...AIR QUALITY ADVISORY FROM THE IDAHO DEPARTMENT OF ENVIRONMENTAL QUALITY FOR Lemhi County has been lifted... * WHAT...Air Quality Advisory because of degraded air quality due to wildfire smoke has been lifted. Air Quality Index is forecast to be moderate. * WHERE...Lemhi County. * IMPACTS...Air quality is acceptable; however, there may be a risk for some people, particularly those who are unusually sensitive to air pollution. THIS STATEMENT IS ISSUED BY THE IDAHO DEPARTMENT OF ENVIRONMENTAL QUALITY, AIR QUALITY GROUP FOR MORE INFORMATION, CONTACT DEQ`s Idaho Falls Regional Office at (208) 528-2650
